Package me.philcali.device.pool.lock

Interface LockingMechanism

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LocalLockingMechanism, LockingMechanismDynamoDB
    public interface LockingMechanism
    A component to facilitate locking, ideally through a distributed system, but the contract does not enforce it. The attempt to lock on an arbitrary input in the form of LockInput, will block according to client control via a CompletableFuture: indefinitely or timeout. Once a lock is in control of, via LockOutput, the client can extend or release held locks. Ideally, locks automatically expire, but implementations may decide not to.
    Version:
    $Id: $Id
    Author:
    philcali

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      LockOutput extend​(LockInput input)
      Attempts to extend the lock that is in the client control.
      void lease​(String lockId)
      Forcibly releases the lock that may or may not be held by the client.
      CompletableFuture<LockOutput> lock​(LockInput input)
      Attempts to acquire a lock on the unique identifier, which is included as the id of the LockInput.

    • Method Detail

      • lock

        CompletableFuture<LockOutput> lock​(LockInput input)
        Attempts to acquire a lock on the unique identifier, which is included as the id of the LockInput.
        Parameters:
        input - The lock information for the LockingMechanism to hold on to
        Returns:
        A CompletableFuture that results in a LockOutput when successfully acquires a lock

      • extend

        LockOutput extend​(LockInput input)
           throws LockingException
        Attempts to extend the lock that is in the client control. An attempt to extend a lock that is not in the client control will result in a conflict, surfaced as a LockingConflictException
        Parameters:
        input - The lock information held by the client in the form of a LockInput
        Returns:
        The updated lock metadata in the form of a LockOutput
        Throws:
        LockingException - Failure to extend the lock

      • lease

        void lease​(String lockId)
    throws LockingException
        Forcibly releases the lock that may or may not be held by the client.
        Parameters:
        lockId - The unique lock identifier to release
        Throws:
        LockingException - Failure to release the lock being held
